entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore was walking toward Harry, wearing sweeping robes of midnight blue. His long silver hair and beard, the piercingly blue eyes behind half-moon spectacles, the crooked nose: Everything was as he had remembered it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry followed Dumbledore as he strode away from where the flayed child lay whimpering. Harry stared at his old headmaster's face.

relationships.description: Dumbledore led Harry to two seats and they sat down together.
Dumbledore strode away from where the flayed child lay whimpering.
Harry followed Dumbledore as he strode away from where the flayed child lay whimpering.
Dumbledore spoke to Harry, saying 'You wonderful boy. You brave, brave man.'
